summary: Passionate software engineer, with an enthusiasm towards learning new technologies. I seek to be a part of an organization that gives an opportunity to utilize skills towards benefiting the organization and for better personal pursuits.

education.institution: Arwachin Bharti Bhawan Sr. Sec. School

experience.description: Worked as a Software Engineer for Cisco BU. I contributed to 3 projects, which involved technologies like python, Javascript, Jenkins and tools like Amplitude, Adobe Target. Later I was responsible for building or improvement and automation of various existing processes of data generation for marketing team.

projects.name: Cisco Webex Online
projects.description: Cisco Webex is a video conferencing product developed by Cisco, My key responsibilities include  building reusable UI components using ReactJS. Developed common cross-browser test framework using Gauge and WebdriverIO/Taiko. Configured CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and task runners using Grunt.

projects.name: SpaceX Launch Finder
projects.description: SpaceX launch finder helps users to find and filter SpaceX launches by year, successful launches or landing. A server side rendered, progressive web app, developed using Next.Js, along with mobile responsive design.

projects.name: Spunky Store
projects.description: A demo e-commerce website for clothing, build for self learning and understanding purpose. Developed with the help of ReactJS, state management using Redux and deployed using heroku. Also integrated with stripe payment api for test payments.

projects.name: Snowflake Eloqua ETL Pipeline
projects.description: Developed ETL scripts using python for automated and periodic transfer of data from Snowflake to Oracle Eloqua. which helped marketing team roll out campaigns.
